name: df-ef
body: |- wceq(ce, cmpt(s0, cc, csu(s1, cn0, co(co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s1))))))
comment: Define the exponential function. Its value at the complex number ` A ` is ` ( exp `` A ) ` and is called the "exponential of ` A ` "; see ~ efval . (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2005.)
